I really like it, but the english translation is so bad that I can't understand what's being communicated. it's not something that completely ruins the experience but I would like to understand the response in the messages
Defs one of the best desktop companion idle game i've played.

V-Pet Simulator is cute and addicting, but definitely still a work in progress. The pets are fun to raise and the presentation is charming, but the game needs more activities, better balancing, and a bit more polish to keep things interesting long-term. Still, it‚Äôs a cozy little time-killer with potential worth trying if you like virtual pet games.

Very nice game, which is rich with a storyline and has nice graphics, though it is not that demanding. The enjoyment and memories are unforgettable. It is also multitasking-friendly, making it easy to play while studying or working.

10/10 breedable
Really good software to mess around with the 700+ steam workshops and interact with.
It's a chill pet simulator, good game to accompany  you when you have something to do

Does it do anything? No. While it may not make you productive in real life or stop you from making bad financial decisions and sometimes annoys you when it walks around the screen. Simply it just being there on my screen is good enough. I can tell it doesn't think a lot.  10/10 experience. I do not regret downloading this magnificent creature.
Adorable desktop pet with smooth animations and simple, enjoyable interactions.
its a nice pet to have when your playing a game or working and much much more.
uh... in short, pretty simple, no frills, no complications, has a workshop, entertaining and light, 8/10
i work from home, always on my computer so its nice having something to interact with from time to time.

its fun to feed her or make her work sometimes she is someone to sit on your screen and chill with but she isnt a good idea to have out if your in a serious project or game or something cuz she tends to move in the center of your screen on purpous
Best, cutest waste of time.  Ruined my gaming sessions whenever she crawled around; which I did not see coming.
Love it. I can have an cute daughter distract me and sabotage my gameplay while i panic because i cant move my cursor or interact when shes in the way of the ui

Really fun having a little friend on my screen while I plow through school work. Also nice using her as a timer for how long I spend on what. Dances to music, likes to crawl around the screen, overall just very wholesome 10/10.

Yea my laptop can't handle her cuteness. It went hot even in Air-conditioning room bruh. If you can run and want a free pet desktop it's yours ig but the modding or some edits is in full chinese if i'm not mistaken.

Highly recommended to people who likes to have a pet in their PC and afk while having it. Other than that, if you're playing game while having it on , it won't disturb Ur gaming section.

Funny and cute game, but can get annoying having to have steam running in the background (can't play other steam games while it's running)

Cute little desktop buddy that actually brightens my day. Low effort, lots of charm, and totally worth getting. 

Interaction is very simple and satisfying. You feed it, play with it, level it up, and unlock other things.. nothing too complicated at all, just enough to keep checking back. The community and workshop add ons are also a nice bonus. There is a steady stream of mods and custom pets, so it never really gets old if you like tweaking things. And the fact that it's free and open source is also pretty cool. 

[*] Adorable visuals and expressive animations
[*] Relaxed, low stress gameplay and perfect for chilling
[*] Very lightweight and compatible on any system
[*] Lot of workshop and customization mods to keep things fresh
[*] Free to play!!
this is very cute, id recommend it to anybody who wants VPET to game with you, or talk with, you can also give it gifts, and a bunch more other stuff.
Defs one of the best desktop companion idle game i've played.
got annoying. sick of that little shit. hope she fucking dies from cancer.

V-Pet Simulator is cute and addicting, but definitely still a work in progress. The pets are fun to raise and the presentation is charming, but the game needs more activities, better balancing, and a bit more polish to keep things interesting long-term. Still, it‚Äôs a cozy little time-killer with potential worth trying if you like virtual pet games.

A cute means of "animating" your desktop.
The interactions are relatively limited so eventually it becomes less interactive.
There are however quite a lot of community content though most of it isn't translated.

My only gripe with Lois is the achievement to have it running for 1000 hours.

it's fun, i enjoy the little micromanagement of taking care of the pet, plus its cute. :3 pretty much have it open all the time, which im sure will have no negative repercussions on my computer in the future haha.........................................................................

negative.review: Made an as an ad for another game. Not fun and is carried by the modding scene which is also just unbearable since it requires you to learn atleast 5 different asian languages not to mention the game itself having terrible translation.

Worst mistake of my live i regret everything after 1000h i cant showcase my 100% Achievements to this little asshole who always jumped on my screen in the worst possible moments i lost some Tarkov and Arena Breakout round because of her.

P.S. cute little thing tho

Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üen

Wufferror

I'm starting to think the dev thought it'd be funny if the vpet easily get's deathly ill if you neglect her for 1 hour and when she auto moves where she pleases you can't easily grab her and flick her back into the corner without her slapping your cursor away lol.
Got me a one way ticket to Epstein Island

Wufferror

This thing is one of the hardest games/apps to control I have ever used. The buttons have super small hitboxes and also occasionally do not work or do the wrong thing. Also the whole app is defaulted to chinese and trying to set it to english is literally IMPOSSIBLE. I used most of my time trying to set it to english. Also there does not seem to be any actual consistent way to switch the language. 

Also while you are trying to change the language, the small character starts hating you for ignoring it. I must say that you should only use this if you are super good at aiming your mouse cursor and you speak chinese really well.

And one extra note I also want to add. Most of the videos and stuff that are shown on this store page does NOT 100% fit the actual gameplay.

I'm starting to think the dev thought it'd be funny if the vpet easily get's deathly ill if you neglect her for 1 hour and when she auto moves where she pleases you can't easily grab her and flick her back into the corner without her slapping your cursor away lol.

Don't get why all the reviews are positive. There was nothing to do.

Tried to install some mods, which has you restart the 'game' at least twice, and then doesn't seem to even work. One mod looked like it was supposed to change the model or something, but that didn't happen.

Oh, and if you have Discord open, any time you click on anything, you'll get a pop-up about going live on Discord, so that's kind of annoying. It happens even if you tell Discord to stop detecting this as a game.

Oh, and the people upset that she is called 'Lolis.' You realize that Loli just means petite and youthful. There are adult lolis in real life. Nothing about the word is specifically about children.
100% Achievements wasn't worth it. Not very interesting gameplay, limited ability and not a good usage of your computing resources
Unfortunately she just isn't very interesting. Perhaps some day she might be, but honestly a lava lamp is more interesting to glance at than her.

buggy laggy too much economicized
even broke my gpu lol

has potential, kind of. which is completely ruined by steams refusal to auto-translate other languages into the users language.  the pet itself is extremely bare bones, almost nothing to do aside from buy snacks and gifts for your pet, and like 4 activities each for work, play, and study. all of which are extremely simple. cute character and animations, but were talking maybe 2 dozen or so 0.2-3 second animations.
 
 the real meat of the application comes from the mod support. which is where everything falls apart instantly, because 98% of the mods are in some kind of hieroglyphs, so you need to just install EVERYTHING and hope for the best. then you need to sift through poorly made menus full of the same hieroglyphs because the game ignores your "custom names" you try to give things so their coherent.
 
 the "game" portion is also very poorly done, requiring you to practice an insane level of micromanagement to balance all of her stats and earn enough money to feed her, while slowly leveling up so you can do higher tier jobs. its all really simple, but very poorly done. the only saving grace is that the pet is cute, but that gets boring fast when you realize tthat she only has a handful of very short animations.
Got me a one way ticket to Epstein Island
it keeps telling my pc its a threat

Also the whole app is defaulted to chinese and trying to set it to english is literally IMPOSSIBLE. I used most of my time trying to set it to english. Also there does not seem to be any actual consistent way to switch the language. 

Also while you are trying to change the language, the small character starts hating you for ignoring it. I must say that you should only use this if you are super good at aiming your mouse cursor and you speak chinese really well.

And one extra note I also want to add. Most of the videos and stuff that are shown on this store page does NOT 100% fit the actual gameplay.

I'm starting to think the dev thought it'd be funny if the vpet easily get's deathly ill if you neglect her for 1 hour and when she auto moves where she pleases you can't easily grab her and flick her back into the corner without her slapping your cursor away lol.

Don't get why all the reviews are positive. There was nothing to do.

Tried to install some mods, which has you restart the 'game' at least twice, and then doesn't seem to even work. One mod looked like it was supposed to change the model or something, but that didn't happen.

Oh, and if you have Discord open, any time you click on anything, you'll get a pop-up about going live on Discord, so that's kind of annoying. It happens even if you tell Discord to stop detecting this as a game.

Oh, and the people upset that she is called 'Lolis.' You realize that Loli just means petite and youthful. There are adult lolis in real life. Nothing about the word is specifically about children.
100% Achievements wasn't worth it. Not very interesting gameplay, limited ability and not a good usage of your computing resources
Unfortunately she just isn't very interesting. Perhaps some day she might be, but honestly a lava lamp is more interesting to glance at than her.

buggy laggy too much economicized
even broke my gpu lol

has potential, kind of. which is completely ruined by steams refusal to auto-translate other languages into the users language.  the pet itself is extremely bare bones, almost nothing to do aside from buy snacks and gifts for your pet, and like 4 activities each for work, play, and study. all of which are extremely simple. cute character and animations, but were talking maybe 2 dozen or so 0.2-3 second animations.
 
 the real meat of the application comes from the mod support. which is where everything falls apart instantly, because 98% of the mods are in some kind of hieroglyphs, so you need to just install EVERYTHING and hope for the best. then you need to sift through poorly made menus full of the same hieroglyphs because the game ignores your "custom names" you try to give things so their coherent.
 
 the "game" portion is also very poorly done, requiring you to practice an insane level of micromanagement to balance all of her stats and earn enough money to feed her, while slowly leveling up so you can do higher tier jobs. its all really simple, but very poorly done. the only saving grace is that the pet is cute, but that gets boring fast when you realize tthat she only has a handful of very short animations.
Got me a one way ticket to Epstein Island
it keeps telling my pc its a threat

Made an as an ad for another game. Not fun and is carried by the modding scene which is also just unbearable since it requires you to learn atleast 5 different asian languages not to mention the game itself having terrible translation.

Worst mistake of my live i regret everything after 1000h i cant showcase my 100% Achievements to this little asshole who always jumped on my screen in the worst possible moments i lost some Tarkov and Arena Breakout round because of her.

P.S. cute little thing tho
